clauses.title: You must provide your identifiable information
clauses.description: The Service requires users to provide their identifiable information, including phone number, iD number or other information, even though this data collection isn’t essential for the purposes of the service. They may still allow pseudonyms in the foreground.
clauses.clause_text:

          I'm glad to see the great detail here!. Link collection

case.text: You must provide your identifiable information

clauses.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text: See also "Usage Data". Many different types of data are listed which is collected.

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.
clauses.clause_text: analytics, sales and marketing

case.text: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: After a User has deleted their user account personal data may be stored only as long as such processing is required by law or is reasonably necessary for our legal obligations or legitimate interests such as claims handling, bookkeeping, internal reporting and reconciliation purposes.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: advertising partners

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: Where you followed a link to Wolt Services

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/trackers
clauses.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.
clauses.clause_text: Meta (Facebook)

case.text: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

clauses.title: Your personal data may be transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: If Wolt is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, we may transfer your personal data to the third party involved.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: market the Wolt Services to you

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: If you connect or login to your account with Facebook, Facebook shares with us personal information about you such as your profile picture, a sample of your Facebook friends and your Facebook ID. While Wolt maintains its page on Facebook both Wolt and Facebook are joint controllers for your personal data. More information on processing of personal data on Facebook is available at Meta Privacy Policy.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
clauses.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.
clauses.clause_text: see below

case.text: Your personal information is used for many different purposes

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: With Partners for the performance of Wolt Services

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your biometric data is collected
clauses.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.
clauses.clause_text: information you provide by phone or in email or chat correspondence with us, including call recordings of your calls with our customer service.

case.text: Your biometric data is collected

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text: show you targeted or personalized advertisements through Wolt Services

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text:
we have service providers, operations and group companies in several geographical locations.
As such, we and our service providers may transfer your personal data to, or process it in, jurisdictions outside the European Economic Area or the User’s domicile.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
clauses.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed. This case doesn't apply to Services for which transparency regarding users identities is relevant for their purposes.

case.text: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

clauses.title: The service is only available in countries approved by the U.S. government
clauses.description: Countries under embargo or banned by the government of the country in question cannot use the service.

case.text: The service is only available in some countries approved by its government

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: analytics

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: The service promises to inform you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data
clauses.description: In case the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they will make reasonable efforts to inform/notify the user (e.g. warrant canary).

case.text: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: below

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
clauses.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.
clauses.clause_text: You may have the right to object to certain use of your personal data if such data are processed for other purposes than necessary for the performance of the Wolt Services or for compliance with a legal obligation.

case.text: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

clauses.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
clauses.description: The service may employ a broad copyright license over feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted, including the right to use them without restriction, compensation or obligation to the user, but they do not claim ownership on them.

case.text: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

clauses.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.
clauses.clause_text: Cookies and other technologies

case.text: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text:
Wolt does not store your personal data longer than is legally permitted and necessary for the purposes of providing the Wolt Services or the relevant parts thereof.
The storage period depends on the nature of the information and on the purposes of processing.
The maximum period may therefore vary per use.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or needs to transfer personal data after a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale of the services, the data will still be processed in a manner that honours the promises made in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text:
However, we will continue to ensure the confidentiality of all personal data.
We will give notice to all the Users concerned when the personal data are transferred or become subject to a different privacy statement.

case.text: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You have the right to receive the personal data you have provided to us yourself in a structured and commonly used format and to independently transmit those data to a third party.

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text:
4.
THE PURPOSES AND GROUNDS FOR THE PROCESSING

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

case.text: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

clauses.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
clauses.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.
clauses.clause_text:
We may share your personal data with third parties outside Wolt if we have a good-faith belief that access to and use of the personal data is reasonably necessary to: (i) meet any applicable law, regulation, and/or court order.
(ii) detect, prevent, or otherwise address fraud, crime, security or technical issues.
and/or (iii) protect the interests, properties or safety of Wolt, the Users or the public as far as in accordance with the law.

case.text: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

clauses.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text: In case the User considers our processing of personal data to be inconsistent with the applicable data protection laws, the User may lodge a complaint with the local supervisory authority for data protection in Finland, the Data Protection Ombudsman (tietosuoja.fi). Alternatively, the User may lodge a complaint with the other local and competent supervisory authority for data protection.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text:
<b>3.
PERSONAL DATA PROCESSED AND SOURCES OF DATA

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
clauses.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.
clauses.clause_text: When data is processed by third parties on behalf of Wolt, Wolt has taken the appropriate contractual and organizational measures to ensure that your data are processed exclusively for the purposes specified in this Privacy Statement and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations and subject to our instructions and appropriate obligations of confidentiality and security measures.

case.text: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
We use administrative, organizational, technical, and physical safeguards to protect the personal data we collect and process.
Measures include for example, where appropriate, encryption, pseudonymization, firewalls, secure facilities and access right systems.
Our security controls are designed to maintain an appropriate level of data confidentiality, integrity, availability, resilience and ability to restore the data.
We regularly test the Wolt Services, systems, and other assets for security vulnerabilities.
Furthermore, access to personal data by employees of Wolt is restricted and access is subject to what is necessary for purposes of the employee’s work assignments.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: Copyright license limited for the purposes of that same service but transferable and sublicenseable

case.text: Copyright license limited for the purposes of that same service but transferable and sublicenseable

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: Push messages and emails can be opted out on the account settings in the app (and on the site if I recall correctly).

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: A free help desk is provided
clauses.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.

case.text: A free help desk is provided

clauses.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.

case.text: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Please note that some parts of the Wolt Services may not function properly if use of cookies is refused.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the User Terms of Service
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service
clauses.clause_text:
Your personal data may also be accessed by employees of Wolt, see section 11.

case.text: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service

clauses.title: Alternative accounts are not allowed
clauses.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.

case.text: Alternative accounts are not allowed

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
ensure that our services are in line with your needs, personal data can be used for things like customer satisfaction surveys.
When possible, we will do this using only aggregated, non-personally identifiable data.

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
